attributes.action: recognise garden sheds as the 'new' modern day place of sanctuary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the dawn of time humans have sort a place of sanctuary. These have included caves, huts, and castles, in more recent time’s places of religious celebration, this has however eroded.

I feel that there is a need for a ‘new’ sanctuary in this modern world and propose the following

•	The 'new' sanctuary is the garden shed (or a place deemed by the founder of the Shed Club as such)

•	They are places of freedom of expression, home brew, invention, tinkering, relaxation and sanctuary

•	The users and members are recognised in the national census as Followers of the Shed

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
